SEARCH
Package gw.api.contact

Class ContactAutoSyncUtilBase

java.lang.Object
gw.api.contact.ContactAutoSyncUtilBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContactAutoSyncUtil, ContactSystemUtil
public abstract class ContactAutoSyncUtilBase extends Object
Base util class for contact auto sync utils. This class is meant to be used as part of singleton implementations, do NOT add state!

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected class 
    ContactAutoSyncUtilBase.AutoSyncNotifierBundleTransactionCallback
    This class is used to notify the ContactAutoSync workers after the bundle in which the work items is created gets committed.
    class 
    ContactAutoSyncUtilBase.ContactSyncException
    An exception that will be thrown if a bundle commit fails during Contact AutoSync.

    syncContact(String addressBookUID, String newAddressBookUID)
    If the local contacts linked to the AddressBook Contact with an ABUID of addressBookUID are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the contact which has an ABUID of newAddressBookUID in the remote Address Book.

  • Method Details

    • syncContact

      protected void syncContact(String addressBookUID)
      If the local contacts are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified

    • syncContact

      protected void syncContact(String addressBookUID, String newAddressBookUID)
      If the local contacts linked to the AddressBook Contact with an ABUID of addressBookUID are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the contact which has an ABUID of newAddressBookUID in the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified
      newAddressBookUID - - the address book uid for the remote contact the local contact should sync to

    • syncContact

      protected void syncContact(String addressBookUID, Key minID, Key maxID, String newAddressBookUID)
      If the local contacts are marked allow auto-sync, this function syncs them up with the remote Address Book.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - the address book uid for remote contact that has been modified

    • maybeSyncContact

      protected void maybeSyncContact(String newAddressBookUID, String abABID, com.guidewire.pl.system.bundle.EntityBundleImpl bundle, Contact remoteContact, Contact contact)

    • performSyncContact

      protected abstract void performSyncContact(Contact remoteContact, Contact contact)

    • createWorkItem

      protected void createWorkItem(String addressBookUID)
      Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID - - Address book uid for the contacts need to re-sync

    • createWorkItem

      protected void createWorkItem(String addressBookUID, String newAddressBookUID)
      Create an contact auto sync work item for this given addressBookUID. If the system config param "InstantaneousContactAutoSync" is set to true, then the ContactAutoSync worker is notified as well. If a newAddressBookUID is specified, the addressBookUID of those contacts will be replaced by newAddressBookUID.
      Parameters:
      addressBookUID -
      newAddressBookUID -

    • getMinMaxContactId

      protected static Key getMinMaxContactId(com.guidewire.commons.system.database.SQLFunction minMaxFunction)

    • createWorkItems
